abilities.name: War Stance
abilities.details:
Wars generates a stack of War Stance for each enemy hero damaged by his basic attacks and abilities, lasting for few seconds and stacking up to ten times.

Each War Stance stack gains Wars bonus physical power (scaling with physical power).

At maximum stacks, Wars gains bonus armour penetration.

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.details:
On the first cast, Wars thrusts his glaive in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit, and briefly slowing them.

Wars's next basic attack then performs a dash to the target and swings his glaive 360-degree around himself upon arrival, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Conqueror
abilities.details:
Wars gains increased attack speed for a short duration. In addition, his basic attacks deal a percentage of the damage as physical damage (scaling with physical power) to enemies in a cone behind the primary target (cleave damage).

At maximum War Stance stacks, Wars will also heals for a percentage of the damage dealt from the weaving attacks.

abilities.name: Augury
abilities.details:
Wars marks the target enemy hero, reducing the target's movement speed and attack speed that continues to increase every second over a duration.

At maximum War Stance stacks, Wars will also gain increased movement speed towards the target.

abilities.name: Dominion
abilities.details:
Wars launches into the air then slams his glaive down at the target location, unleashing a shockwave that deals physical damage (scaling with physical power) to nearby enemies and fearing everyone except the target marked by Augury.

At maximum War Stance stacks, Wars will also create a Dominion zone for a few seconds around himself, becoming immune to all damage and negative effects originating from enemies outside the zone.
